Requirement Description: System shall load dashboard within 3 seconds
System shall support concurrent users without performance degradation
DataTables shall load efficiently using server-side processing
All IDs in URLs shall be encrypted
All forms shall implement CSRF protection
All user inputs shall be validated and sanitized
File uploads shall be validated for type and size
Interface shall be responsive and mobile-friendly
System shall provide clear error messages
System shall provide confirmation dialogs for destructive actions
Navigation shall be intuitive and consistent
Email notifications shall be queued and retry on failure
Database transactions shall ensure data integrity
System shall maintain audit logs for critical operations
